name: HONEYPAD
description: Honeypad is a hyper-deflationary use-case token, which has cutting-edge features and a unique use case and functions as an umbrella brand for different use cases. HoneyPad rewards token holders with auto-BNB payments gained through transaction taxes while also preventing huge sell offs with their first of a kind Honeylock feature. Honeypad aims to make the cryptocurrency market – especially the decentralized finance and freelance market – faster and secure for its users.
